Constructor Detail

AlarmSpineSetupFunction

public AlarmSpineSetupFunction()
Method Detail

setSensor

public void setSensor(byte sensor)
Sets the sensor involved on the current Feature function setup request Note that a Feature function setup request is always made on a 'per sensor' basis. To activate features over different sensors, it's necessary to do a Feature function setup request per each sensor and then to activate the required features on the involved sensors.

Parameters:
sensor - the sensor code
See Also:
SPINESensorConstants

getSensor

public byte getSensor()
Getter method of the sensor involved in this setup request

Returns:
the sensor involved in this setup request
See Also:
SPINESensorConstants

setWindowSize

public void setWindowSize(short windowSize)
Sets the size of the window over which computes the features that will eventually activated thru a Feature Spine Function Req

Parameters:
windowSize - the window size expressed in number of samples

getWindowSize

public short getWindowSize()
Getter method of the size of the window over which the features will be computed

Returns:
the size of the window involved in this setup request

setShiftSize

public void setShiftSize(short shiftSize)
Sets the shift size on the window over which computes the features that will eventually activated thru a Feature Spine Function Req

Parameters:
shiftSize - the overlap amount (ahead shift) over the previous window

getShiftSize

public short getShiftSize()
Getter method of the shift size involved in this setup request

Returns:
the shift size involved in this setup request
